title: Set Project Dependent Functions
text: vvcommander package contains collection helper functions designed simplify streamline common tasks R programming. Furthermore, package provides methods set project settings R.

title: Set Project Dependent Functions
text: Contributions vvcommander welcome. standard GitHub process followed contributing: fork repository, make changes, submit pull request.
